p: However, as Africa seems to be at the early phase of the outbreak, African countries are able to look at current real-life examples, such as in Europe and in Asia, to see what works and what does not, in terms of reducing the spread of the virus and minimizing mortality rates. Using a combined strategy from South Korea, Singapore, and even Germany would be ideal; however, it is not realistic as the socio-demographics of those countries are not comparable.
